original_text:
“In vain I punished your people;
    they did not respond to correction.
Your sword has devoured your prophets
    like a ravenous lion.
korean_text: 내가 너희 자녀들을 때린 것이 무익함은 그들이 징계를 받아들이지 아니함이라 너희 칼이 사나운 사자 같이 너희 선지자들을 삼켰느니라

sentences.original_text: In vain I punished your people
they did not respond to correction
Your sword has devoured your prophets
